overview: Scott Resnick specializes in innovative and alternative solutions for project development. He creates project scopes, monitors launches, and creates marketing plans for clients. Scott is deeply connected with the day-to-day activities of Hardin Design & Development and oversees account management, portfolio investments, and human resources. In addition, Resnick’s interests extend beyond the world of technology as he recently presented original research at the prestigious Midwest Political Science Association’s 2008 conference in Chicago, IL. Resnick’s Bachelor of Arts is in Legal Studies and Political Science from the University of Wisconsin-Madison, where he was an Undergraduate Research Scholar.
